real-estate-agent.title: Real Estate Agent
real-estate-agent.tagline: AI lists the property. Humans close the deal.

tasks.description: AI generates comparative market analyses and property valuations from data.
AI writes listing descriptions, generates virtual tours, and creates marketing materials.
AI identifies potential buyers/sellers and qualifies leads automatically.
AI matches buyers to properties based on preferences, budget, and lifestyle.
AI tracks market trends, generates reports, and predicts pricing movements.
AI manages paperwork, deadlines, and compliance but complex closings need humans.
Negotiating price, terms, and contingencies requires human persuasion and strategy.
Guiding people through their biggest financial decision requires human empathy.
Neighborhood knowledge, off-market deals, and local connections are human advantages.

companies.name: Zillow
companies.threat: AI-powered home search with Zestimates reducing need for agent expertise on pricing

companies.name: Redfin
companies.threat: Tech-enabled brokerage with lower commissions and AI-powered search

companies.name: Opendoor
companies.threat: AI-powered iBuyer making instant offers — bypassing agents entirely

companies.name: Compass
companies.threat: AI-powered brokerage tools that make agents more productive

companies.name: Matterport
companies.threat: AI 3D tours reducing need for in-person showings

timeline.description: AI handles 55% of marketing and analysis. Agents focus on relationships and negotiation.
AI manages most search and marketing. Agents become negotiation and advisory specialists.
Simple transactions may go agentless. Top agents thrive on complex deals and luxury markets.

skills.description: Serve affluent buyers and sellers — relationship-intensive, high-commission.
Commercial property sales and leasing — more complex, harder to automate.
Help investors analyze deals and build portfolios.
Elite negotiation skills — the irreplaceable human advantage.
Use AI tools for 10x marketing reach while providing personal service.

journalist.title: Journalist
journalist.tagline: AI writes the news brief. Humans break the story.

tasks.description: AI generates earnings reports, sports recaps, weather updates, and data-driven stories.
AI searches databases, public records, and archives for background information.
AI transcribes interviews, press conferences, and generates summary notes.
AI monitors social media for breaking news, trends, and public sentiment.
AI analyzes datasets and generates data visualizations but framing the story is human.
Cultivating sources, following leads, and uncovering corruption requires human persistence.
Building trust with sources and conducting revealing interviews is human.
Deciding what's newsworthy, fair, and ethical requires human judgment.
Compelling storytelling that connects with readers requires human craft.

companies.name: Automated Insights
companies.threat: AI that generates millions of data-driven articles — sports, finance, real estate

companies.name: OpenAI
companies.threat: AI generating news summaries and analysis at publication quality

companies.name: Perplexity
companies.threat: AI search engine that delivers researched answers — competing with news for information

companies.name: Narrativa
companies.threat: AI content generation for newsrooms — automated reporting at scale

companies.name: Google
companies.threat: AI-generated news snippets reducing traffic to news publications

timeline.description: AI handles routine reporting and research. Journalists focus on investigation and narrative.
AI generates most commodity news. Journalists focus on investigative, feature, and analysis.
Routine news fully automated. Human journalists focus on accountability, investigation, and storytelling.

skills.description: Deep investigative reporting — the highest-value, hardest-to-automate journalism.
Video, podcast, and interactive storytelling across platforms.
Analyze data to uncover stories — combine reporting with analytics.
Build a personal brand and direct audience — the new journalism model.
Use AI to research faster, analyze more data, and produce more stories.

translator.title: Translator / Interpreter
translator.tagline: AI translates the words. Humans translate the meaning.

tasks.description: AI translates business documents, emails, and general content with high accuracy.
AI translates and localizes software interfaces, websites, and apps.
AI provides real-time speech-to-speech translation across languages.
AI generates translated subtitles for video content.
AI handles technical documents but domain-specific nuance needs human review.
Translating literature, poetry, and creative works requires artistic human judgment.
High-stakes legal and medical translation requires certified human accuracy.
Adapting content for cultural context — idioms, humor, sensitivity — is deeply human.
Live conference interpretation is improving but still requires human performers.

companies.name: DeepL
companies.threat: AI translation that rivals human quality for most language pairs

companies.name: Google
companies.threat: Free AI translation supporting 130+ languages with improving quality

companies.name: Meta
companies.threat: AI speech-to-speech translation across 100 languages in real-time

companies.name: Smartling
companies.threat: AI-powered translation management platform for enterprise localization

companies.name: Phrase
companies.threat: AI translation platform with neural machine translation and quality estimation

timeline.description: AI handles 80% of general translation. Human translators focus on creative, legal, and specialized work.
Real-time translation quality approaches human level. Interpreters focus on high-stakes and cultural contexts.
General translation automated. Human translators focus on literary, legal, and culturally sensitive work.

skills.description: Certified legal translation — high-stakes, regulated, and well-compensated.
Clinical trials, medical devices, and pharmaceutical — lives depend on accuracy.
Translate literature, film, and creative works — the artistic translation niche.
Review and refine AI translations — the new standard translation workflow.
Manage enterprise localization programs — beyond word-for-word translation.

actuary.title: Actuary
actuary.tagline: AI runs the model. Humans assess the risk.

tasks.description: AI builds and updates life tables and mortality models from large datasets.
AI calculates insurance reserves using standard actuarial methods.
AI builds product pricing models incorporating risk factors and market data.
AI analyzes policyholder data to identify trends in claims, lapses, and utilization.
AI generates statutory reports and solvency calculations.
Designing insurance products that balance risk, profitability, and market need requires creativity.
Enterprise risk management, capital allocation, and strategic risk decisions need human judgment.
Presenting risk assessments to regulators and boards requires human communication.
Evaluating climate, pandemic, and cyber risks where historical data is limited is human.

companies.name: Milliman
companies.threat: AI actuarial software automating reserving, modeling, and valuation

companies.name: Willis Towers Watson
companies.threat: AI-powered actuarial tools for pricing and risk modeling

companies.name: Earnix
companies.threat: AI pricing and rating engine for insurance companies

companies.name: Moody's
companies.threat: AI risk modeling platform for insurance and financial services

companies.name: Akur8
companies.threat: AI-powered insurance pricing that automates actuarial rate-making

timeline.description: AI handles 60% of routine actuarial calculations. Actuaries focus on strategy and emerging risks.
AI manages standard reserving and pricing. Actuaries focus on product innovation and ERM.
Routine actuarial work automated. Actuaries focus on emerging risks, product design, and strategic advisory.

skills.description: Strategic ERM across the organization — the C-suite path for actuaries.
Combine actuarial science with machine learning for advanced predictive models.
Climate, cyber, pandemic — model risks where traditional data doesn't exist.
Design novel insurance products for evolving markets.
Master AI actuarial tools and lead digital transformation in insurance.

editor.title: Editor
editor.tagline: AI catches the typo. Humans shape the story.

tasks.description: AI catches grammar, spelling, style, and consistency errors with high accuracy.
AI verifies claims against databases and sources but nuanced fact-checking needs humans.
AI checks content against AP Style, brand guidelines, and custom style rules.
AI summarizes long-form content for different formats and audiences.
AI optimizes headlines, meta descriptions, and content for search performance.
Reorganizing content flow, strengthening arguments, and improving narrative structure.
Shaping story arc, character development, and overall vision requires editorial judgment.
Deciding what to publish, setting editorial direction, and maintaining voice is human.
Mentoring writers, giving nuanced feedback, and developing talent is human.

companies.name: Grammarly
companies.threat: AI writing assistant that catches errors and suggests improvements — replacing basic copy editors

companies.name: Writer
companies.threat: Enterprise AI writing platform enforcing brand voice and style automatically

companies.name: Anthropic
companies.threat: AI that edits, rewrites, and improves content at professional editor quality

companies.name: Acrolinx
companies.threat: AI content governance platform ensuring consistency across enterprise content

companies.name: Jasper
companies.threat: AI content platform that generates and edits marketing copy at scale

timeline.description: AI handles 65% of copy editing. Editors focus on structural, developmental, and strategic editing.
AI handles most grammar and style editing. Editors focus on story development and editorial strategy.
Copy editing automated. Human editors focus on developmental editing, strategy, and writer mentorship.

skills.description: Shape narratives and guide writers — the highest-value editing skill.
Set editorial direction and content strategy for publications and brands.
Use AI tools to edit faster while applying human judgment to the hard parts.
Edit across formats — video, podcast, and interactive content.
Specialized editing in medical, legal, or technical domains commands premium rates.
